summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Board of Park Commissioners of The City of Seattle to purchase a certain tract of land on the shores of Green Lake, containing nine and ninety-five one-hundredths (9.95) acres, more or less, including all riparian and littoral rights appurtenant thereto, the same being a portion of Government Lot two (2), Section six (6), Township Twenty-five (25) North, Range four (4) east Willamette Meridian, King County, Washington; and authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to draw their warrants in payment therefor.
